protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =
Seedlings were grown in half strength of MS agar medium with 2% sucrose in continuous light at 22 degree Celsius.
Total RNA was extracted using Plant RNeasy kit (QIAGEN) following instruction.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 10 ug of total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hrs at 45 degree Celsius on GeneChip. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000.
